document_data.name: Pendar Cymrych
document_data.mainbody: '''Pendar Cymrych''' was High King of the [[Moonshae Isles]] in the early-to-mid 8{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|33}}
document_data.Relationships: He was a member of the [[Cymrych Dynasty]] and the son of his predecessor, High King [[Alec Cymrych II|Alec II]]. His successor was his first son, [[Declan Cymrych]].
